Verses: 1 yesu Andraiyadhiname Veettilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Kadaloraththile Utkaarndhaar.
2 thiralaana Janangal Avaridaththil Koodivandhapadiyaal, Avar Padavil Eri Utkaarndhaar; Janangalellaarum Karaiyile Nindraargal.
3 avar Anega Vishesangalai Uvamaigalaaga Avargalukku Sonnaar; Kelungal, Vidhaikkiravan Oruvan Vidhaikkap Purappattaan.
4 avan Vidhaikkaiyil, Sila Vidhai Vazhiyaruge Vizhundhadhu; Paravaigal Vandhu Adhaip Patchiththuppottadhu.
5 sila Vidhai Adhiga Mannillaadha Karpaarai Idangalil Vizhundhadhu; Man Aazhamaayiraadhadhinaale Adhu Seekkiramaai Mulaiththadhu.
6 veyil Erinapodho, Theeyndhupoi, Verillaamaiyaal Ularndhu Poyitru.
7 sila Vidhai Mullulla Idangalil Vizhundhadhu; Mul Valarndhu Adhai Nerukkippottadhu.
8 sila Vidhaiyo Nalla Nilaththil Vizhundhu, Siladhu Nooraakavum, Siladhu Arupadhaakavum, Siladhu Muppadhaakavum Balan Thandhadhu.
9 ketkiradharku Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endraar.
10 appozhudhu, Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: En Avargalodae Uvamaigalaagap Pesugireer Endru Kettaargal.
11 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Paralogaraajyaththin Ragasiyangalai Ariyumpadi Ungalukku Arulappattirukkiradhu. Avargalukko Arulappadavillai.
12 ullavan Evano Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum, Paripooranamum Adaivaan; Illaadhavan Evano Avanidaththilirundhu Ulladhum Eduththukkollappadum
13 avargal Kandum Kaanaadhavargalaayum, Kettum Kelaadhavargalaayum, Unarndhukollaadhavargalaayum Irukkirapadiyinaal, Naan Uvamaigalaaga Avargalode Pesugiren.
14 esaayaavin Theerkkadharisanam Avargalidaththil Niraiverugiradhu; Adhaavadhu: Kaadhaarakkettum Unaraadhiruppeergal; Kannaarakkandum Ariyaadhiruppeergal.

15 indha Janangal Kangalinaal Kaanaamalum, Kaadhugalinaal Kelaamalum, Irudhayaththinaal Unarndhu Manandhirumpaamalum, Naan Avargalai Aarokkiyamaagaamalum Irukkumpadiyaaga, Avargal Irudhayam Kozhuththirukiradhu; Kaadhaal Mandhamaaik Kettu, Thangal Kangalai Moodikkondaargal Enpadhe.
16 ungal Kangal Kaankiradhinaalum, Ungal Kaadhugal Ketkiradhinaalum, Avaigal Paakkiyamullavaigal.

17 anega Theerkkadharisigalum Needhimaangalum Neengal Kaangiravaigalaik Kaanavum, Neengal Ketkiravaigalaik Ketkavum Virumbiyum, Kaanaamalum Kelaamalum Ponaargalendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
18 aagaiyaal Vidhaikkiravanaippatriya Uvamaiyaik Kelungal.
19 oruvan, Raajyaththin Vasanaththaik Kettum Unaraadhirukkumpodhu, Pollaangan Vandhu, Avan Irudhayaththil Vidhaikkappattadhaip Pariththukkollukiraan; Avane Vazhiyaruge Vidhaikkappattavan.
20 karpaarai Idangalil Vidhaikkappattavan, Vasanaththaikkettu, Udane Adhaich Sandhoshaththode Etrukkollugiravan;
21 aagilum Thanakkulle Verillaadhavanaai, Konjakkaalamaaththiram Nilaiththiruppaan; Vasanaththinimiththam Upaththiravamum Thunbamum Undaanavudane Itaraladaivaan.
22 mullulla Idangalil Vidhaikkappattavan, Vasanaththaik Ketkiravanaayirundhum, Ulagakkavalaiyum Aisuvariyaththin Mayakkamum Vasanaththai Nerukkip Podugiradhinaal, Avanum Palanatruppovaan.
23 nalla Nilaththil Vidhaikkappattavano, Vasanaththaik Ketkiravanum Unarukiravanumaayirundhu, Nooraagavum Arubadhaagavum, Muppadhaagavum Palan Tharuvaan Endraar.
24 veroru Uvamaiyai Avargalukku Sonnaar: Paralokaraajyam Nalla Nilaththil Vidhaikkappatta Nalla Vidhaiyai Vidhaiththa Manushanukku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
25 manushar Niththirai Pannugaiyil Avanudaiya Saththuru Vandhu, Kodhumaikkul Kalaigalai Vidhaiththuvittup Ponaan.
26 payiraanadhu Valarndhu Kadhir Vittapodhu, Kalaikalum Kaanappattadhu.
27 veettejamaanudaiya Velaikkaarar Avanidaththil Vandhu: Aandavane, Neer Umadhu Nilaththil Nalla Vidhaiyai Vidhaiththeer Allavaa? Pinne Adhil Kalaigal Eppadi Undaanadhu Endraargal.
28 adharku Avan: Saththuru Adhaich Seydhaan Endraan. Appozhudhu Velaikkaarar: Naangal Poi Avaigalaip Pidungippoda Umakkuch Siththamaa? Endru Kettaargal.
29 adharku Avan Vendaam, Kalaikalaip Pidungumpodhu Neengal Kodhumaiyaiyungooda Verode Pidungaadhapadikku Irandaiyum Aruppu Mattum Valaravidungal.

30 aruppukkaalaththil Naan Arukkiravargalai Nokki: Mudhalaavadhu Kalaikalaippidungi, Avaigalaich Sutterikkiradharku Kattukalaagak Kattungal; Kodhumaiyaiyo En Kalanjiyaththil Serththuvaiyungal Enpen Endru Sonnaan Endraar.
31 veroru Uvamaiyai Avargalukku Sonnaar: Paralogaraajyam Kadugu Vidhaikku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Oru Manushan Eduththuth Than Nilaththil Vidhaiththaan.
32 adhu Sagala Vidhaigalilum Siridhaayirundhum, Valarumpodhu, Sagala Poondukalilum Peridhaagi, Aagaayaththupparavaigal Adhin Kilaigalil Vandhu Adaiyaththakka Maramaagumendraar.

33 veroru Uvamaiyai Avargalukku Sonnaar: Paralogaraajyam Puliththa Maavukku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Oru Sthiree Eduththu, Muzhuvadhum Pulikkum Varaikkum, Moondrupadi Maavile Adakkivaiththaal Endraar.
34 ivaigalaiyellaam Yesu Janangalode Uvamaigalaagap Pesinaar. Uvamaigalinaaleyandri, Avargalode Pesavillai.
35 en Vaayai Uvamaigalaal Thirappen, Ulagaththotramudhal Maraiporulaanavaigalai Velippaduththuven Endru Theerkkadharisiyaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
36 appozhudhu Yesu Janangalai Anuppivittu Veettukkupponaar. Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhu, Nilaththin Kalaigalaippatriya Uvamaiyai Engalukku Velippaduththaventumendru Kettaargal.
37 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Nalla Vidhaiyai Vidhaikkiravan Manushakumaaran.
38 nilam Ulagam; Nalla Vidhai Raajyaththin Puththirar; Kalaigal Pollaanganudaiya Puththirar;
39 avaigalai Vidhaikkira Saththuru Pisaasu; Aruppu Ulagaththin Mudivu; Arukkiravargal Dhevadhoodhargal.
40 aadhalaal, Kalaigalaich Serththu Akkiniyaal Sutterikkiradhupola, Ivvulagaththin Mudivile Nadakkum.
41 manushakumaaran Thammudaiya Thoodhargalai Anuppuvaar; Avargal Avarudaiya Raajyaththil Irukkira Sagala Idaralgalaiyum Akkiramanj Seykiravargalaiyum Serththu,
42 avargalai Akkinich Soolaiyile Poduvaargal; Ange Azhukaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkum.
43 appozhudhu, Needhimaangal Thangal Pidhaavin Raajyaththile Sooriyanaippolap Piragaasippaargal. Ketkiradharku Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan.

44 andriyum, Paralogaraajyam Nilaththil Pudhaindhirukkira Pokkishaththukku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhai Oru Manushan Kandu, Maraiththu, Adhaip Patriya Santhoshaththinaale Poi, Thanakku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Vitru, Andha Nilaththaik Kollugiraan.
45 melum, Paralogaraajyam Nalla Muththukkalaith Thedugira Viyaapaarikku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
46 avan Vilaiyuyarndha Oru Muththaik Kandu, Poi, Thanakkundaana Ellaavatraiyum Vitru, Adhaik Kollugiraan.
47 andriyum, Paralogaraajyam Kadalile Podappattu, Sagala Vidhamaana Meengalaiyum Serththu Vaarikkollum Valaikku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
48 adhu Niraindhapodhu, Adhaik Karaiyil Izhuththu, Utkaarndhu, Nallavaigalaik Koodaigalil Serththu, Aagaadhavaigalai Erindhupoduvaargal.
49 ippadiye Ulagaththin Mudivile Nadakkum. Dhevadhoodhargal Purappattu, Needhimaangalin Naduvilirundhu Pollaadhavargalaip Piriththu,
50 avargalai Akkinich Soolaiyile Poduvaargal; Ange Azhukaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkum Endraar.
51 pinbu, Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Ivaigalaiyellaam Arindhukondeergalaa Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avargal: Aam, Arindhukondom, Aandavare, Endraargal.

52 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Ippadiyirukkirapadiyaal, Paralogaraajyaththukkatuththavaigalil Ubadhesikkappattuth Therina Vedhapaarakan Evanum Than Pokkishaththilirundhu Pudhiyavaigalaiyum Pazhaiyavaigalaiyum Eduththukkodukkira Veettejamaanaagiya Manushanukku Oppaayirukkiraan Endraar.
53 yesu Indha Uvamaigalai Solli Mudiththapinbu, Avvidam Vittu,
54 thaam Valarndha Oorile Vandhu, Avargaludaiya Jeba Aalayaththile Ubadhesampanninaar. Avargal Aachchariyappattu: Ivanukku Indha Gnaanamum Balaththa Seykaigalum Eppadi Vandhadhu?
55 ivan Thachchanudaiya Kumaaran Allavaa? Ivan Thaai Mariyaal Enpaval Allavaa? Yaakkopu Yose Seemon Yoodhaa Enpavargal Ivanukku Sagodharar Allavaa?
56 ivan Sagodharigal Ellaarum Nammidaththil Irukkiraargal Allavaa? Ippadiyirukka, Idhellaam Ivanukku Eppadi Vandhadhu? Endru Solli,
57 avaraik Kuriththu Idaraladaindhaargal. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Theerkkadharisi Oruvan Than Oorilum Than Veettilumeyandri Verengum Kanaveenamadaiyaan Endraar.
58 avargaludaiya Avisuvaasaththinimiththam Avar Ange Anega Arpudhangalai Seyyavillai.
